snippet.title: Aragami 2 - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Where there is light, there must be shadow. First Aragami 2 Gameplay Trailer Showcases Major Evolution of the Stealth Action Franchise. Coming to PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S/X and PC on September 17th, 2021.
